sentences.english: The following information is provided by Macau Inter-University Institute and posted by Student Affairs Section.
sentences.chinese: 以下资料由澳门高等校际学院提供，学生事务处代传。

sentences.english: Approved by the College, student may elect courses from other university according to inter-university agreement.
sentences.chinese: 学生可以根据校际协议，经学校同意跨校修读课程。

sentences.english: Soon after he was asked to work with an Intercollegiate Commission to form a system of academic apparel.
sentences.chinese: 不久，他被任命到校际委员会来规划一套学位服。

sentences.english: No a unified system of training coaches and inter-school competitions system.
sentences.chinese: 没有统一的教练员培训制度和校际比赛制度。
该大学贬低校际橄榄球赛的重要性。

sentences.english: Our department is badly in need of two computers to promote the inter-university contacts.
sentences.chinese: 我系急需两台电脑，以加强校际之间的。

sentences.english: Wang Nan is a ping pong player. She's pretty. I think she likes to swim.
sentences.chinese: 是校际乒乓球冠军，她当然选择了王楠。

sentences.english: He takes part in the intercollegiate sports every year.
sentences.chinese: 他每年参加大学校际运动会。

sentences.english: Students need not wear school uniforms in the inter-school concert.
sentences.chinese: 学生参加校际音乐会时不必穿校服。

sentences.english: All classes will be held at the Macau Inter-University Institute.
sentences.chinese: 所有课程的上课地点均在澳门高等校际学院。

sentences.english: He will preside at the election of school officers.
sentences.chinese: 他是校际选举大会的主席。

sentences.english: Carry on the intercollegiate exchange is the important link to run the party school.
sentences.chinese: 校际交流是办好党校的重要环节。

definition: universities and colleges/abbr. for 高等學校|高等学校
invitation tournament (e.g. between schools or firms)
subsidiary primary school (originally attached to an institute, university etc)/abbreviation of 附屬小學|附属小学
to pass brilliantly (used in congratulatory fashion)
senior high school/abbr. for 高級中學|高级中学[gao1 ji2 zhong1 xue2]
